comments.body:
Created an attachment (id=6042)
Simple optimizations of httpstatus code lookups

comments.author: Oleg Kalnichevski
comments.body: *** HTTPCLIENT-252 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

comments.author: Oleg Kalnichevski
comments.body:
Granular non-standards configuration based on the new preference architecture
implemented. See HTTPCLIENT-132 for details

Oleg

description:
A simple strict or setLenient is likely inadequate.  Each particular
non-standard behaviour should be tagged, and settable from the client.  A mask
for particular behavioural features could be provided, with STRICT meaning none
and LENIENT meaning all.
